traits.locale_text: Вас обманули клерки одного из Вольных торговцев при передаче десятины с его миров. Доказать, что виновны в расхождениях в подсчетах не вы, вам так и не удалось.

languages.text: Вас обманули клерки одного из Вольных Торговцев при передаче десятины. Доказать, что в расхождениях в подсчетах виноваты не вы, вам так и не удалось.
You were defrauded by a group of clerks in the service of a Rogue Trader while collecting a tithe shipment. You were never able to prove that you were not the one responsible for the discrepancy.
languages.original_text: Вас обманули клерки одного из Вольных Торговцев при передаче десятины. Доказать, что в расхождениях в подсчетах виноваты не вы, вам так и не удалось.

traits.locale_text: You were defrauded by a group of clerks in a Rogue Trader's service when collecting a tithe shipment. You were never able to prove that you were not the one responsible for the discrepancy.
You were defrauded by a group of clerks in a Rogue Trader's service when collecting a tithe shipment. You were never able to prove that you were not the one responsible for the discrepancy.
You were defrauded by a group of clerks in the service of a Rogue Trader while collecting a tithe shipment. You were never able to prove that you were not the one responsible for the discrepancy.
You were defrauded by a group of clerks in the service of a Rogue Trader while collecting a tithe shipment. You were never able to prove that you were not the one responsible for the discrepancy.
You were defrauded by a group of clerks in the service of a Rogue Trader while collecting a tithe shipment. You were never able to prove that you were not the one responsible for the discrepancy.
You were defrauded by a group of clerks in the service of a Rogue Trader while collecting a tithe shipment. You were never able to prove that you were not the one responsible for the discrepancy.

languages.text: Du wurdest von einigen Beamten im Dienst eines Freihändlers bei der Übernahme einer Zehntlieferung übervorteilt. Du konntest nie beweisen, dass du für den Fehlbetrag nicht verantwortlich warst.
languages.original_text: You were defrauded by a group of clerks in the service of a Rogue Trader while collecting a tithe shipment. You were never able to prove that you were not the one responsible for the discrepancy.

traits.locale_text: Du wurdest von einigen Beamten im Dienst eines Freihändlers bei der Übernahme einer Zehntlieferung übervorteilt. Du konntest nie beweisen, dass du für den Fehlbetrag nicht verantwortlich warst.

languages.text: En collectant une cargaison de dîme, vous vous êtes fait escroquer par un groupe de greffiers au service d'un libre-marchand. Vous n'avez pas réussi à prouver que vous n'étiez pas responsable de la différence par rapport au paiement attendu.
languages.original_text: You were defrauded by a group of clerks in the service of a Rogue Trader while collecting a tithe shipment. You were never able to prove that you were not the one responsible for the discrepancy.

traits.locale_text: En collectant une cargaison de dîme, vous vous êtes fait escroquer par un groupe de greffiers au service d'un libre-marchand. Vous n'avez pas réussi à prouver que vous n'étiez pas responsable de la différence par rapport au paiement attendu.

languages.text: 你在征收什一税的时候，被一群为某个行商浪人效力的文员骗了。直到最后你也未能洗刷污名，证明什一税的资源缺失并不是你造成的。
languages.original_text: You were defrauded by a group of clerks in the service of a Rogue Trader while collecting a tithe shipment. You were never able to prove that you were not the one responsible for the discrepancy.

traits.locale_text: 你在征收什一税的时候，被一群为某个行商浪人效力的文员骗了。直到最后你也未能洗刷污名，证明什一税的资源缺失并不是你造成的。

languages.text: Te estafó un grupo de funcionarios al servicio de un Comerciante Independiente mientras recogías un envío del diezmo. Nunca conseguiste demostrar que la discrepancia no fue culpa tuya.
languages.original_text: You were defrauded by a group of clerks in the service of a Rogue Trader while collecting a tithe shipment. You were never able to prove that you were not the one responsible for the discrepancy.

traits.locale_text: Te estafó un grupo de funcionarios al servicio de un Comerciante Independiente mientras recogías un envío del diezmo. Nunca conseguiste demostrar que la discrepancia no fue culpa tuya.

languages.text: あなたは租税の積荷を回収する際に、ローグトレーダーに仕える職員たちによる詐欺に遭った。不一致の責任が自分にはないことを証明できなかった。
languages.original_text: You were defrauded by a group of clerks in the service of a Rogue Trader while collecting a tithe shipment. You were never able to prove that you were not the one responsible for the discrepancy.

traits.locale_text: あなたは租税の積荷を回収する際に、ローグトレーダーに仕える職員たちによる詐欺に遭った。不一致の責任が自分にはないことを証明できなかった。

languages.text: Aşar sevkiyatı toplarken bir Hür Tacir'in hizmetindeki kâtipler tarafından dolandırıldın. Hesaplardaki tutarsızlığın senden kaynaklanmadığını da bir türlü kanıtlayamadın.
languages.original_text: You were defrauded by a group of clerks in the service of a Rogue Trader while collecting a tithe shipment. You were never able to prove that you were not the one responsible for the discrepancy.

traits.locale_text: Aşar sevkiyatı toplarken bir Hür Tacir'in hizmetindeki kâtipler tarafından dolandırıldın. Hesaplardaki tutarsızlığın senden kaynaklanmadığını da bir türlü kanıtlayamadın.
